= Introduction =

fdplugins is a project containing a collection of various [http://www.flashdevelop.org FlashDevelop] plugins.


= Details =

This is the complete list of available plugins you can find here:

 * QuickFind
 * TaskList
 * BookmarkPanel
 * AsClassWizard
 * FlashApi
 * SourceOptions
 * StickiesNotes 
 
Please use the plugin specific wiki page to report issues or comments, or use the [Issues http://code.google.com/p/fdplugins/issues/list] page to report bugs.
